posts.title: ğŸ”Š 1.0.1 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.1 Patch Note

âš¡ Revision was made on Product category, so expired products can't be install anymore.

âš¡After purchasing fixed-term items, the expiration display has been modified to be displayed when the expiration date expires.

âš¡ [Game Mode] It has been modified so that the sound is output when the back button is touched.

âš¡ [Garage] The vehicle name display length has been modified.

âš¡ Revised to remove expired characters and vehicles when updating inventory.

âš¡ Fixed the alignment of the character above the in-game and the name display that were misplaced.

âš¡ Added Tapjoy Shop Event icon and function.

âš¡ Fixed an issue where store alignment did not work properly.

âš¡ Modified the profile to expose character vehicle stats and skill information.

âš¡ [Garage] We modified the items that is currently installing so that they are aligned at the front.

âš¡ [Garage] If Players have more than one same paint, we have improved it to indicate the quantity on one item.

âš¡ [Option] We adjusted the size of the web view window considering the sizes of the device.

âš¡ [Option] Fix related to web view back Button issue

â¡ï¸ Add store data

â¡ï¸ Disable the Login Guest button

posts.title: ğŸ”Š 1.0.2 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.2 Patch Note

Hello GoGo Racers!

ğŸ“¢ ğŸ“¢ğŸ“¢ We have an update today, March 25, 2022! As we want to give you an amazing game, here are detailed patch notes:

ğŸ“¢ Fixed the type display on the paint and package in the purchase pop-up window.

ğŸ“¢ Correct the alignment in Iteam League that applies to the same team when using EMP.

ğŸ“¢ Activate the "Change Installation" button in the matching room.

ğŸ“¢ Modified the alignment of track difficulty level of each league that was displayed differently.

ğŸ“¢ Modified the text "cencel" â¡ï¸ "cancel" in the system pop-up window

ğŸ“¢ Altered the basic animation of the practice character.

ğŸ“¢ Changed UI effects of results on the Time Attack Mode.

ğŸ“¢ Upcoming new car and character added in the shop.

ğŸ“¢ Correct the appearance of repeated acquisition when acquiring item boxes during Item League play

ğŸ“¢ Ingame distance calculation UI, modify function to operate until end of game

ğŸ“¢ Fixed the appearance that AI when the network is unstable.

ğŸ“¢ Changed the display: Pop-up window will be removed when all attendance compensation is obtained

ğŸ“¢ Established Account Linking on Google or Facebook Account.

ğŸ“¢ Fixed the animation on the ranking profile.

     ğŸ“± : You may download the game here: https://bit.ly/3JCuqTP

     ğŸŒ: To know more about our games visit:https://linktr.ee/BSSPH

posts.title: ğŸ”Š 1.0.3 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.3 Patch Note

Fix version informations:

âš¡ Fixed incorrect game information version.

âš¡ Modified game reward icon to appear differently when you lose the game.

âš¡ Fixed vehicle change pop-up error in the matching room.

âš¡ Added exception if the expired characters are installed.

âš¡ Revised exception handling if the expired vehicle is installed.

âš¡ Fixed sound setting: to prevent sound from coming out when the effect was turned off.

âš¡ Fixed / Adjusted reward icon size.

âš¡ Applied correction on the item acquisition effect when using magnetic field items.

âš¡ Applied correction on turtle attack whereas the attack effect does not disappear when the shield is used.

âš¡ Fixed Attendance Reward Pop-up.

âš¡ Languages:

âš¡ Added 7 new text translations: Japanese, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Thai, Spanish, French, and Italian.

â¡ï¸ Unavailable language is locked for processing.

â¡ï¸ Fixed issue where language is set automatically when the user moved to the lobby

posts.title: ğŸ”Š 1.0.4 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.4 Patch Note

Hello GoGo Racers!

ğŸ“¢ğŸ“¢ğŸ“¢ We have an update today, June 14, 2022! As we want to give you an amazing and exciting game, here are detailed patch notes:

âš™ï¸ Unveiled a new character, a strict and arrogant chick named Bbi

âš™ï¸ Added new cars, one is small and cute car called Minimi and a special car called Speedstar.

âš™ï¸ Added six (6) new tracks:

 â¡ï¸ GoGo Stadium

 â¡ï¸ New Town

  â¡ï¸ Lost Temple

  â¡ï¸ Western Town

  â¡ï¸ Clock Tower

  â¡ï¸ Space City

âš™ï¸ GoGo Racing has a total of 14 tracks as of the moment.

âš™ï¸ Modified the packages on the shop. Items for each packages are already visible with images.

âš™ï¸ Added a lobby chat

âš™ï¸ Added a gacha system on the game.

âš™ï¸ Added a Victory box on the lobby which can be obtained by getting 10 trophies.

âš™ï¸ Added a Free box on the lobby that can be received every four (4) hours.

âš™ï¸ Improved the performance and animations of the game.

âš™ï¸ Improved the UI of the game.

âš™ï¸ Fixed the bugs on the game.
